tech_news.title: The creators of Dark Sky have a new weather app that shares multiple predictions - The Verge
tech_news.description: The creators of Dark Sky have released Acme Weather for iOS, a new weather app that provides alternative predictions to its primary forecast.

tech_news.title: "Game preservation only works if people care" As GOG doubles down on its commitment to saving old games, it's asking players "who give a s**t" to support its crusade - Eurogamer

tech_news.title: Celebrating 8 years of Hunt! - huntshowdown.com
tech_news.description: Hunt: Showdown is a competitive first-person PvP bounty hunting game with heavy PvE elements. Set in the darkest corners of the world, Hunt packs the thrill of survival games into a match-based format.

tech_news.title: Nacon Connect 2026 set for March 4 - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Nacon will host Nacon Connect 2026 on March 4 at 11:00 a.m. PT / 2:00 p.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube and Twitch.
